Dasa rattiyo vasitvāna, mucceyya pārivāsiko’’ti. (pari. 477) –

Ayaṃ parivāragāthāpamāṇaṃ. Ekadivasaṃ sataṃsaṅghādisesāpattiyo āpajjitvā dasadivase chādanavasena sataṃdivase sahassasaṅghādisesāpattiyo chādayitvāti attho. Ayamettha saṅkhepattho – yo ^a^V2.0417^ea^ dasadivase sataṃ saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā dasadivase paṭicchādeti, tena rattisataṃ āpattisahassaṃ paṭicchāditaṃ hotīti. ^b^Dasa rattiyo vasitvānā^eb^ti ‘‘sabbāva tā āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannā’’ti parivāsaṃ yācitvā dasa rattiyo vasitvāti attho. ^b^Mucceyya pārivāsiko^eb^ti parivāsaṃ vasanto bhikkhu attanā vasitabbaparivāsato mucceyya, mutto bhaveyyāti attho.

947.^b^Pārājikāni aṭṭhevā^eb^ti aggahitaggahaṇena. ^b^Tevīsa garukā^eb^ti bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇā bhikkhunīnaṃ dasa, bhikkhunīhi ^a^M2.0525^ea^ asādhāraṇā bhikkhūnaṃ cha, ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇā sattāti evaṃ tevīsa saṅghādisesā.

948.^b^Vuttānī^eb^ti yathāvuttāni nissaggiyāni. ^b^Dvecattālīsa hontī^eb^ti bhikkhuvibhaṅgāgatā tiṃsa, bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇā bhikkhunīnaṃ ādito dvādasa cāti dvācattālīsa nissaggiyāni honti. Aṭṭhāsītisataṃ pācittiyā pubbe dassitāva.
949.^b^Susikkhenā^eb^ti suṭṭhu sikkhitaadhisīlāditividhasikkhena bhagavatā.

950.^b^Supaññenā^eb^ti sobhaṇā dasabalacatuvesārajjachaasādhāraṇādayo paññā yassa so supañño, tena. ^b^Yasassinā^eb^ti aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūhasaṅkhātaparivārayasā ca sabbalokabyāpakaguṇaghosasaṅkhātakittiyasā ca tena samannāgatattā yasassinā. ^b^Aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni bhavantī^eb^ti yathādassitagaṇanāya piṇḍavasena paññāsādhikāni tīṇi satāni bhavantīti attho. Supaññena yasassinā gotamena ^b^paññattāni sabbāni^eb^ sikkhāpadāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni bhavantīti yojanā.
951.^b^Etesu^eb^ sikkhāpadesu yo sārabhūto vinicchayo vattabbo, so sakalo mayā samāsena ^b^sabbathā^eb^ sabbākārena vuttoti yojanā.
952.^b^Idaṃ^eb^ uttaraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ.

953.^b^Tasmā^eb^ti mayā vicāretvā vuttattāva. ^b^Atthe^eb^ti vacanatthabhāvatthādibhede atthe vā. ^b^Akkharabandhe^eb^^a^V2.0418^ea^^b^vā^eb^ti akkharasaṅkhātapadabandhe vā. ^b^Viññāsassa kamepi vā^eb^ti uddesavasena ganthanikkhepassa kamepi. ^b^Kaṅkhā na kātabbā^eb^ti ‘‘yathāadhippetassa ^a^M2.0526^ea^ idaṃ vācakaṃ nu kho, avācaka’’nti vā ‘‘idamayuttaṃ nu kho, yutta’’nti vā ‘‘idamadhikaṃ nu kho, ūna’’nti vā ‘‘idamaghaṭṭitakkamaṃ nu kho, ghaṭṭitakkama’’nti vā ‘‘idaṃ viruddhasamayaṃ nu kho, aviruddhasamaya’’nti vā ‘‘idaṃ duruttaṃ nu kho, suvutta’’nti vā ‘‘idaṃ satthakaṃ nu kho, niratthaka’’nti vā kaṅkhā vimati yena kenaci na kātabbā. ^b^Bahumānatā^eb^ti ‘‘vinayo saṃvaratthāyā’’tiādinā (pari. 366) niddiṭṭhapayojanaparamparāya mūlakāraṇattā mahatī sammānā kātabbāti attho.

954.^b^Yo^eb^ bhikkhu ^b^sauttaraṃ^eb^ uttarapakaraṇena sahitaṃ ^b^vinayassavinicchayaṃ^eb^ nāma pakaraṇaṃ ^b^jānāti^eb^ dhammato ceva atthato ca vinicchayato ca sabbathā avabujjhati, ^b^so^eb^ bhikkhu attanā sikkhitabbāya sikkhāya sabbaso viññātattā sikkhāpakena ācariyena vināpi sikkhituṃ samatthoti. ^b^Nissayaṃ vimuñcitvā^eb^ti ācariyupajjhāye nissāya vāsaṃ muñcitvā. ^b^Yathākāmaṅgato siyā^eb^ti yādisā yādisā attanā gāmitā, tattha tattha gamanāraho bhaveyyāti attho.

955. Nissayaṃ dātukāmena. Saha vibhaṅgena ^b^savibhaṅgaṃ^eb^. Saha mātikāya ^b^samātikaṃ. Idaṃ^eb^ sauttaraṃ vinayavinicchayapakaraṇaṃ ^b^suṭṭhu vācuggataṃ katvā^eb^ ganthato suṭṭhu paguṇaṃ vācuggataṃ katvā atthato, vinicchayato ca sammā jānitvā evaṃ dātabbanti yojanā.

956-7.^b^Yo^eb^ bhikkhu ^b^imaṃ^eb^ sauttaraṃ vinayavinicchayapakaraṇaṃ vācāya ^b^paṭhati,^eb^ manasā ^b^cinteti,^eb^ aññehi vuccamānaṃ ^b^suṇāti,^eb^ atthaṃ ^b^paripucchati,^eb^ paraṃ ^b^vāceti,^eb^ niccaṃ ^b^atthaṃ upaparikkhati^eb^ yathāparipucchitamatthaṃ hetuudāharaṇapavattivasena upagantvā samantato ^a^M2.0527^ea^ ikkhati paññāya niyameti vavatthapeti, tassa pana bhikkhussa ^b^vinayanissitā sabbeva atthā^eb^ āpattānāpattikappiyākappiyādipabhedā sabbe atthā ^b^hatthe āmalakaṃ viya^eb^ karatale amalamaṇiratanaṃ viya ^b^upaṭṭhahanti^eb^ pākaṭā bhavantīti yojanā. Natthi etassa malanti ^b^amalaṃ,^eb^ amalameva ^b^āmalaka^eb^nti maṇiratanaṃ vuccati.

958. Natthi etesaṃ buddhīti ^b^abuddhī,^eb^ abuddhī ca te janā cāti ^b^abuddhijanā,^eb^ abuddhijanānaṃ ^a^V2.0419^ea^ sāraṃ avasāraṃ osīdanaṃ dadāti ādadāti karotīti ^b^abuddhijanasāradaṃ,^eb^ buddhivirahitānaṃ agādhaṃ gambhīraṃ. Tehi aladdhapatiṭṭhaṃ ^b^amatasāgaraṃ^eb^ saddattharasāmatassa, nibbānāmatassa vā paṭilābhakāraṇattā sāgarasadisaṃ ^b^paramaṃ^eb^ uttamaṃ ^b^imaṃ uttaraṃ sāgaraṃ^eb^ āsannapaccakkhaṃ uttarapakaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ samuddasāgaraṃ sārado hutvā ^b^uttaraṃ^eb^ uttaranto pariyosāpento ^b^naro^eb^ bhikkhu ^b^hi^eb^ yasmā ^b^vinayapārago^eb^ vinayapiṭakassa pariyantaṃ gato hutvā ^b^pārago^eb^ pāraṃ saṃsārassa pārasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchanto ^b^siyā^eb^ bhaveyyāti yojanā.

959.^b^Ato^eb^ti tasmādeva kāraṇā ^b^avapūratorato^eb^ pāpapūrato nirāsaṅkatāya orato nivatto pāpabhīruko naro ^b^tamaṃ vidhūya^eb^ pāpabhīrukatāya eva cittapariyuṭṭhānavasena uppajjanakaṃ mohandhakāraṃ tadaṅgapahānavasena vidhametvā. ^b^Sabbaṅgaṇakammadaṃ^eb^ sabbesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ aṅgaṇānaṃ kammaṃ tadaṅgādipahānaṃ dadāti āvahatīti ‘‘sabbaṅgaṇakammada’’nti laddhanāmaṃ ^b^sukhassa padaṃ^eb^ lokiyalokuttarassa sukhassa kāraṇaṃ ^b^guṇasaṃhitaṃ^eb^ sīlādīhi atthabhūtehi guṇehi saṃhitaṃ yuttaṃ guṇappakāsakaṃ ^b^hitaṃ^eb^ amatosadhaṃ viya ^a^M2.0528^ea^ sabbadosasabbabyādhirahitatāya ajarāamatādiguṇāvahattā hitaṃ ^b^imaṃ uttaraṃ^eb^ nāma pakaraṇaṃ ^b^sakkaccaṃ^eb^ ādaro hutvā ^b^niccaṃ^eb^ satataṃ ^b^sikkhe^eb^ ‘‘evaṃ paricayantaṃ karomī’’ti cintetvā ekantena yathāvuttapayojanasādhanayoggaṃ katvā ajjhenādivasena sikkheyya eva, na ajjhupekkhako bhaveyyāti yojanā.

960.^b^Paṭubhāvakare^eb^ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlapūraṇe, sāsanapaccatthikābhibhavane ca paṭubhāvaṃ chekattaṃ vesārajjaṃ karoti attānaṃ dhārentānaṃ lajjipuggalānanti paṭubhāvakare ^b^parame^eb^ tatoyeva uttame ^b^piṭake^eb^ vinayapiṭake ^b^paṭutaṃ^eb^ pāṭavaṃ paññākosallaṃ abhipatthayantena paṭunā yatinā nimmalappavattikena ^b^paṭunā vidhinā^eb^ chekena sārena vidhānena ^b^idaṃ^eb^ sauttaraṃ vinayavinicchayapakaraṇaṃ ^b^satataṃ^eb^ nirantaraṃ ^b^pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ^eb^ uggahaṇadhāraṇaparipucchācintanādivasena sikkhitabbanti yojanā.
Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
Sabbasaṅkalananayakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

961-3. Mahesino ^a^V2.0420^ea^ tividhassāpi ^b^sāsanassa suciraṭṭhitikāmena^eb^ aticirakālappavattiṃ icchantena ^b^dhīmatā^eb^ pasatthatarañāṇena ^b^suddhacittena^eb^ lābhasakkāranirapekkhatāya parisuddhajjhāsayena ^b^buddhadattena^eb^ buddhadattābhidhānena ācariyavarena racito.

Pajjavasena ^b^ganthato, atthato ceva^eb^ paramuttaro ^b^uttaro^eb^ vinicchayo ^b^antarāyaṃ antarena^eb^ ajjhattikaṃ, bāhiraṃ vā ^a^M2.0529^ea^ antarāyaṃ vinā yathā ^b^siddhiṃ upāgato^eb^ pariniṭṭhānaṃ patto, tathā sattānaṃ ^b^dhammasaṃyutā^eb^ kusalūpasaṃhitā ^b^saṅkappā^eb^ manorathā ^b^sijjhantu^eb^ antarāyaṃ vinā nippajjantu, etena uttaravinicchayaracanāmayena mahatā puññodayena catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ rañjetīti ^b^‘‘rājā’’^eb^ti saṅkhaṃ gato mahīpālo ^b^mahiṃ^eb^ pathavisannissitaṃ janakāyaṃ ^b^sammā^eb^ ñāyena dasa rājadhamme akopento pāletu. ^b^Devo^eb^ pajjunno ^b^kāle^eb^ thāvarajaṅgamānaṃ upayogārahakāle ^b^sammā pavassatu^eb^ avuṭṭhiativuṭṭhikaṃ akatvā sammā pavacchatu.

964.^b^Selindo^eb^ sinerupabbatarājā ^b^yāva tiṭṭhati^eb^ yāva loke pavattati, ^b^cando^eb^ sakalajanapadanayanasāyano ^b^yāva virocati^eb^ yāva attano sabhāvaṃ joteti, tāva yasassino ^b^gotamassa^eb^ arahato sammāsambuddhassa ^b^saddhammo^eb^ pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhavasena tividho saddhammo ^b^tiṭṭhatu^eb^ pavattatu.

965. Sīhādīnaṃ, dāhādīnañca bāhirajjhattikānaṃ parissayānaṃ khamanaṃ sahanaṃ abhibhavitvā pavattanaṃ ^b^khanti. Soracca^eb^nti sobhane ratoti ^b^surato,^eb^ suratassa bhāvo soraccaṃ. Sundaraṃ akhaṇḍatādiguṇasamannāgataṃ sīlaṃ assāti ^b^susīlo^eb^. Susīlassa bhāvo.
Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Uttaravinicchayaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
Iti vinayatthasārasandīpanī nāma vinayavinicchayavaṇṇanā,
Līnatthapakāsanī nāma uttaravinicchayavaṇṇanā ca
Samattā.
Pacchā ṭhapitagāthāyo
Therena ^a^M2.0530^ea^^a^V2.0421^ea^ thiracittena, sāsanujjotanatthinā;
Puññavā ñāṇavā sīlī, suhajjo muduko tathā.
Yo sīhaḷārimaddesu, candimā sūriyo viya;
Pākaṭo ^b^sīvali^eb^tthero, mahātejo mahāyaso.
Tena nītā sīhaḷā yā, idha pattā sudhīmatā;
Esā saṃvaṇṇanā sīha-ḷakkharena sulikkhitā.
^b^Revato^eb^ iti nāmena, therena thiracetasā;
Arimaddike rakkhantena, parivattetvāna sādhukaṃ.
Likhāpitā hitatthāya, bhikkhūnaṃ arimaddike;
Esā saṃvaṇṇanā suṭṭhu, sanniṭṭhānamupāgatā;
Tatheva sabbasattānaṃ, sabbattho ca samijjhatūti.
